Let's support Mozilla

I love Mozilla and you should too.

It's a low bar, but Mozilla is the best of the four major client-side internet companies: Apple, Google, Mozilla, and Microsoft.

I encourage everyone to support Mozilla any way you can.

There are paid versions of this resource which allow you to follow topics to stay on top of trends. This is super useful and I would encourage you to support Mozilla any way you can. There are also several other services like a vpn that they provide. This isn’t sponsored content, I just really love Mozilla. Maybe I’ll make a post another time about why.
